name: artworkwindows
description: Static web page that showcases artwork thumbnails inside a nostalgic Windowsâ„¢-95 style interface. A Start menu opens the gallery window and the window itself can be dragged around the teal desktop. Artwork images and metadata are loaded at runtime from the [artwork-snake](https://github.com/dannybellieveit/artwork-snake) repository so no binary assets are stored here.
